title: Manage OO Workflow Designer users
content:
Role Location
System Administrator IdM Administration Console of OO Workflow Designer

To manage users, click OO Workflow Designer APPLICATION > IdM Administration Console, click the organization name, then click the Users tab. This page displays user name, the first authentication date, and the last authentication date.

The user management page lists all users in the organization. You can search, add, edit, and delete the users.

Search for an existing user

To search for an existing user:

  • In the upper-right corner, enter the user name into the search bar, then click search to perform the search. 

Add a new user

  1. Click  on the top right menu to add a user.
  2. Enter the user name, display name and password.
  3. Choose the user type: REGULAR or SYSTEM
  4. Select the Password Policy.
  5. To define user attributes, in the User Attributes area: 
    1. Click Add Attributes  to add user attributes.
    2. In the Attribute Name box, enter the name
    3. In the Value box, enter the valid value
    4. Click SAVE. The user attributes gets saved.

You can choose whether to enter the password for a user. Users with passwords are IdM internal users. Users without passwords are from other authentication flows, such as from LDAP or  SAML. You can add passwords to those users from other authentications to create an internal IdM user with the same user name. To delete an internal user, you can just delete the password.

Edit an existing user 

  1.  Click a user name, then click the action button  on the top right menu to edit a user. You can:
    1. Change the display name
      1. In the Display Name area, enter a new name and then click SAVE.
    2. Choose to lock the user
      1. Toggle on <image> to lock or unlock the user.
    3. Edit or delete the user attributes 
      1. To edit a user attribute, click a user attribute. Then click edit  and change the attribute value. Click SAVE.
      2. To delete a user attribute, choose the user attribute you want to delete, then click the action icon  on the top right menu, and then click REMOVE to confirm the deletion.

Remove the user password

To change a user's password:

  1. Choose the user you want to remove the password for, then click edit  on the top right menu.
  2. Click REMOVE PASSWORD.
  3. Click REMOVE to confirm the password removal.

Add a new password

To add a new password after removing user password:

  1. Choose the user you want to add the new password for, then click edit  on the top right menu.
  2. Click ADD PASSWORD.
  3. In the Password and Confirm Password fields, enter the new password, and then click SAVE.

Change the user password

To change a user's password:

  1. Choose the user you want to change the password for, and then click edit  on the top right menu.
  2. Click RESET PASSWORD. 
  3. In the Password and Confirm Password fields, enter the new password, and then click SAVE.

Delete an existing user 

To delete an existing user:

  • Choose the user you want to delete, then click the action icon  on the top right menu, and then click REMOVE to confirm the deletion.
